description.displayText: Maria took care of my home from December 2015 through September 2016 (until I sold my home).  I could always count on her to arrive when she said she would and do a thorough job cleaning everything.  She's very pleasant and friendly.  She had a key to my home and was very trustworthy.  I counted on her to take care of my home when I traveled, was out-of-town and in the process of selling the house.  She always did a great job and he house looked fantastic thanks to her.  I would highly recommend Maria and  wish I could still have her as my housekeeper.  She's a great cleaner and a great person!

description.displayText: So far, Maria has cleaned our house only once but my parents and I were very impressed with her thorough cleaning and attention to detail. My son has eczema and my dad has emphysema. She understood our needs and went above and beyond. I do recommend Maria if you are looking for a general or deep clean. I am definitely having Maria come back next week.

description.displayText:
Maria has done work for me for many years. She is personable, and easy to work with. She comes with a goal in mind, and will work hard to please her customers. She is always moving. She has a system in which she uses to ensure your home or business is in tip top shape. I think Maria will be a wonderful asset to you and your business.  I hope she is given the job. 
Ruth W.

description.displayText: Maria worked for us for about 7 years. She was always dependable, honest, pleasant and a hard worker. With 3 dogs, our house is always a mess by the end of the week, but after Maria had been there it was clean and spotless at least for a few hours. She was also helpful with our dogs and would gladly go beyond the call of duty. We really miss her and have not been able to find a suitable replacement. If she were back in Huntsville, she would definitely have a job with us!
